---
applyTo: "**"
---

These are all the available components

## Controller Board · 1 pc

**Spec:** Arduino-UNO style microcontroller board (USB programmable).
**Description:** Main programmable board that runs sketches and connects sensors/actuators.

## 5V 1602A LCD Module (with pin header) · 1 pc

**Spec:** 16×2 character LCD, 5 V, with 16-pin header.
**Description:** Text display for showing menus, values and status.

## OLED I2C Display Module  · 3 pcs

* **Screen size & resolution:** 0.96-inch OLED display, 128×64 pixels, provides sharp and detailed text and images.
* **Display type:** Monochrome (white) OLED screen.
* **Interface:** Uses I2C communication, requiring only 2 control lines (SCL, SDA).
* **Pinout:** 4 pins — VCC (power +), GND (power −), SCL (clock), SDA (data).
* **Power note:** Works directly at **3.3 V**; **not compatible with 5 V** interfaces.

## Breadboard Expansion Board · 1 pc

**Spec:** Small adapter PCB for mounting modules to a breadboard.
**Description:** Lets you attach modules or displays neatly to a solderless breadboard.

## 4×4 Matrix Keypad Module · 1 pc

**Spec:** 16-button membrane keypad (4 rows × 4 cols).
**Description:** User input device for digits and simple commands.

## 830-tie-point Breadboard · 1 pc

**Spec:** Standard solderless prototyping breadboard (~830 holes).
**Description:** Prototyping surface used to build circuits without solder.

## Ultrasonic Distance Sensor · 1 pc

**Spec:** HC-SR04 style ultrasonic range sensor (Trigger/Echo pins).
**Description:** Measures distance to objects using ultrasonic pulses.

## Servo Motor · 1 pc

**Spec:** Hobby 3-wire servo (PWM control, ~0–180°).
**Description:** Provides precise angular position control for mechanisms.

## Potentiometer (10K) · 2 pcs

**Spec:** Rotary variable resistor, 10 kΩ.
**Description:** Adjustable voltage divider for contrast, input or tuning.

## Temperature-Humidity Sensor · 1 pc

**Spec:** DHT11-style digital temp & humidity sensor.
**Description:** Provides simple environmental temperature and humidity readings.

## Stepper Motor · 1 pc

**Spec:** Small geared stepper (e.g., 28BYJ-48, 5 V).
**Description:** Controlled incremental rotation for accurate positioning.

## Touch Sensor · 1 pc

**Spec:** Capacitive or simple touch switch module (digital output).
**Description:** Detects fingertip contact to act as a push/button input.

## 5V Relay (SRD-05VDC-SLC) · 1 pc

**Spec:** Electromechanical relay with 5 V coil (low-voltage control).
**Description:** Allows the microcontroller to switch higher-voltage AC/DC loads.

## Power Supply Module · 1 pc

**Spec:** Breadboard power regulator module (provides +5 V / +3.3 V).
**Description:** Supplies regulated power rails for the breadboard circuits.

## Joystick Module · 1 pc

**Spec:** 2-axis analog joystick with push switch.
**Description:** Provides X/Y analog inputs and a button press for control.

## ULN2003 Stepper Motor Driver Board · 1 pc

**Spec:** ULN2003 transistor array driver board for small steppers.
**Description:** Interface board that drives the included stepper motor.

## 74HC595 Shift Register · 1 pc

**Spec:** 8-bit serial-in / parallel-out shift register IC.
**Description:** Expands digital outputs using serial data from the microcontroller.

## 4-Digit 7-Segment Display · 1 pc

**Spec:** Four-digit numeric 7-segment module (through-hole pins).
**Description:** Displays multi-digit numeric values (time, counters, etc.).

## 7-Segment Display (single) · 1 pc

**Spec:** Single numeric 7-segment LED display.
**Description:** Small numeric readout for single-digit values.

## Active Buzzer · 1 pc

**Spec:** Buzzer with built-in oscillator (DC driven).
**Description:** Produces a tone when powered (no PWM required).

## Passive Buzzer · 1 pc

**Spec:** Piezo buzzer (requires driven frequency from MCU).
**Description:** Generates tones when driven by PWM or an audio signal.

## Push Buttons · 5 pcs

**Spec:** Momentary tactile switches (through-hole).
**Description:** Simple push buttons for controls and menus.
**Important:** Each button has 4 pins spread over a 3x3 matrix. All 4 pins must be placed on the breadboard. 

## Tilt Switch · 1 pc

**Spec:** Mechanical tilt sensor/switch.
**Description:** Closes or opens when the module is tilted; used for motion/orientation detection.

## 2N2222 Transistors · 2 pcs

**Spec:** NPN general-purpose transistor (TO-92).
**Description:** Used for switching small loads and general amplification.

## Infrared Receiver Head · 1 pc

**Spec:** 38 kHz IR receiver (3-pin device).
**Description:** Receives IR remote signals from the included remote control.

## RGB LED · 1 pc

**Spec:** 3-lead RGB (common anode/cathode) through-hole LED.
**Description:** Produces colored light by mixing red, green and blue elements.

## 5528 Photoresistor (LDR) · 2 pcs

**Spec:** 5528/LDR light-dependent resistor.
**Description:** Changes resistance with light level for ambient sensing.

## 103 Thermistor · 1 pc

**Spec:** “103” NTC thermistor (typically 10 kΩ @ 25 °C).
**Description:** Temperature sensor based on resistance change with temperature.

## Diode Rectifier (1N4007) · 2 pcs

**Spec:** 1N4007 general-purpose rectifier diode.
**Description:** Used for blocking/reverse-polarity protection and rectification.

## Fan Motor (with propeller) · 1 pc

**Spec:** Small DC motor with plastic fan blade.
**Description:** Simple motor + prop for airflow demonstrations or cooling.

## LEDs (White, Yellow, Red, Blue, Green) · 25 pcs (mixed)

**Spec:** Through-hole indicator LEDs in multiple colors.
**Description:** Visual indicators for status, signals, and projects.

## Resistor 10KΩ · 10 pcs

**Spec:** 10 kΩ fixed resistors.
**Description:** Common pull-ups, pull-downs and divider resistors.

## Resistor 1KΩ · 10 pcs

**Spec:** 1 kΩ fixed resistors.
**Description:** Typical series resistor for LEDs and small circuits.

## Resistor 220Ω · 10 pcs

**Spec:** 220 Ω fixed resistors.
**Description:** Standard LED current-limiting resistor value.

## Resistor 100Ω · 10 pcs

**Spec:** 100 Ω fixed resistors.
**Description:** Low-value resistor for current limiting and basic filtering.

## Resistor 100KΩ · 10 pcs

**Spec:** 100 kΩ fixed resistors.
**Description:** High-value resistors for weak pull-downs or sensor dividers.

## Resistor 10Ω · 25 pcs

**Spec:** 10 Ω (labelled 10R) resistors.
**Description:** Low-ohm resistor useful for current sensing or limiting.

## Resistor 2KΩ · 10 pcs

**Spec:** 2.0 kΩ fixed resistors.
**Description:** Mid-range resistor for divider networks and biasing.

## Resistor 5.1KΩ · 10 pcs

**Spec:** 5.1 kΩ fixed resistors.
**Description:** Specific value for reference or sensor circuits.

## Resistor 1MΩ · 10 pcs

**Spec:** 1 MΩ fixed resistors.
**Description:** Very high resistance for input biasing and weak pull-ups.

## Resistor 330Ω · 10 pcs

**Spec:** 330 Ω fixed resistors.
**Description:** Another common LED series resistor or small load limiter.

## 65× Jumper Wires (assorted) · 1 set

**Spec:** Assorted male/male, female/female and male/female jumper wires.
**Description:** Interconnects for breadboard and module wiring.

## USB Cable · 1 pc

**Spec:** USB cable to program/power the controller (type depends on board).
**Description:** Connects the board to a PC for uploading sketches and serial power.

## 20× Male-to-Female Jumper Wires · 1 set

**Spec:** Short male-to-female jumper leads.
**Description:** Useful for connecting module pins to headers or breadboard rails.

## Remote Control (IR) · 1 pc

**Spec:** Infrared remote handset (multi-button).
**Description:** Controls IR-receiver modules for remote operation.

## 9V Battery with DC Adapter · 1 pc

**Spec:** 9 V battery and snap-on DC adapter jack.
**Description:** Portable power source for breadboard power module or standalone projects.
